RDVDenyWriteAccess.Description: Deny write access to removable drives not protected by BitLocker

Behavior.When_Enabled_1: USB drives are READ-ONLY until encrypted. Shows prompt: 'Encrypt this drive with BitLocker?'
Behavior.When_Disabled_0: USB drives work normally (no prompt, no encryption requirement)

SecurityImpact.DataExfiltrationRisk: HIGH if disabled - USB drives can be used without encryption
SecurityImpact.MalwareRisk: MEDIUM - ASR and Defender still scan USB drives
SecurityImpact.Usability: HIGH impact - users expect normal USB behavior

AlternativeSecurity: ASR Rules block executable content from USB
Users can still manually encrypt with BitLocker (right-click â†’ Turn on BitLocker)

ApplyBehavior.PromptMessage:
BitLocker USB Protection:

Do you want to require BitLocker encryption for USB drives?

YES: USB drives will be READ-ONLY until encrypted (shows encryption prompt)
NO:  USB drives work normally (manual encryption available)

Recommended for HOME USERS: NO
Recommended for ENTERPRISE: YES
